'''Sunyata Flowers''' are an [[Exploration]] mechanic found in [[Vourukasha Oasis]], [[Sumeru]].

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial|Sunyata Flowers}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{Lang|{{W|Śūnyatā}}|sa=शून्यता}} is an Indian philosophical concept within Hinduism, Budhism and Jainism. It is usually translated as "emptiness." But the concept has multiple meanings depending on its doctrinal context. It is either an ontological feature of reality, a meditative state, or a phenomenological analysis of experience.
